lemma matches_ipassmt_iface_constrain_srcip_mexpr_case_Iface: fixes ifce::iface assumes "ipassmt_sanity_nowildcards ipassmt" and "\<And>ips. ipassmt (Iface (p_iiface p)) = Some ips \<Longrightarrow> p_src p \<in> ipcidr_union_set (set ips)" shows "matches (common_matcher, \<alpha>) (ipassmt_iface_constrain_srcip_mexpr ipassmt ifce) a p \<longleftrightarrow> matches (common_matcher, \<alpha>) (Match (IIface ifce)) a p"
